@bettwsresident @EnvAgencySW @SoilsAlliance Convoluted long slopes, deep fine structured soil beaten to a pulp and left bare over winter what could go wrong. As for penalties I am sure there was an amnesty to allow filming but its a Compliance Breach GAEC 5 as well

@RossCherrington @EnvAgencySW @SoilsAlliance looking at the field, banky and sandy with a plough pan putting that into parsnips (or stubble turnips) and lifting them in dec, soil loss was entirely predictable.  This was a clear a breach of basic rules. I hope the farmer has had his warning, so next year he can be nicked.

@bettwsresident @EnvAgencySW @SoilsAlliance There could be mitigation methods employed,  but these normally aren't considered by the grower and a lot of these fields are sub let  on a short term agreement
